sentences.english: This is no longer the shadow, mobile phone shutdown, who knows where.
sentences.chinese: 二哥早没了影，手机关机，谁也不知去了哪儿。

sentences.english: My second brother was then Judge there.
sentences.chinese: 我的二哥那时候在那里做法官。

sentences.english: ' And his answer was: 'When you become the Monkey King, you can see me.
sentences.chinese: 二哥答道，“你当上美猴王的那天，就能见到我了。”

sentences.english: I have three brothers, the tallest of whom is my second elder brother.
sentences.chinese: 我有三个哥哥，其中最高的是我二哥。

sentences.english: My second brother lives in a McMansion.
sentences.chinese: 我二哥住在一幢豪宅里面。

sentences.english: In 26 years, brother have send back a letter, said to Yanan.
sentences.chinese: 民国26年二哥曾经寄回一封信，说要投奔延安。

sentences.english: I'm a red apple. Whitey likes me best.
sentences.chinese: 我是红红的苹果，猪二哥最爱吃了。

sentences.english: No, I'm not laughing at you, " Chueh-hui answered sincerely."
sentences.chinese: “不，二哥，我不笑你，”觉慧诚恳地说。

definition: eldest brother/big brother (polite address for a man of about the same age as oneself)/gang leader/boss
father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
older male cousin via female line
elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
second-eldest child in a family/(euphemism) penis
